item.title: How do i make other people admin
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

What ever source your using, go into the characters profiles, and look at there character info, there should be something like:

[CHARACTER] character-height = character-posx = character-posy = character-rights = character-ismember = character-messages = character-lastconnection = character-lastlogin = character-energy = character-gametime = character-gamecount =

As you can see, there is character rights, change that to number 2 for admin, or number 3 for co-owner/owner.

Read full topic
